TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
Greetings.

The game is simple. Someone says a superpower and the next person to respond chooses a side effect. Example:

Forum user No. I: I can fly

Forum user No. II: You have 5000 confused cats.

Superpower: I can time travel.

(repeats until the thread dies or when the earth arrives at it’s unavoidable end).

ATTENTION: please specify if you are listing a super power or side effect to avoid confusion.

I will start:

Superpower: I can summon and throw pizzas like ninja stars.

Edited August 29, 2021 by Stormpilot

Side effect: you have to pay for the pizzas, which are 100000 dollars each

Superpower: I can have infinite boosters without ksp crashing

Side effect: You can no longer add single boosters and you have to add 5000 at a time making rockets uncontrollable.

Superpower: Laser eyes.

SE: While cleaning teeth, you suddenly looked at the mirror.

SP: Internal AdBlock in head.

Side effect: Websites can turn it off.

Super power: Being able to teleport in the Star Wars universe

Side effect: NO RETURN PORTAL. you are stuck there forever

Super power: the ability to fly

Side effect: You can only fly to the other identical thread on this topic that I rember was on here at some point

 

Super power: Mind control. Take over someone’s mind and then be able to go back to yours and leave them unharmed by default.

SE: every time you do that, a small piece of your brain disappears.

SP: I can summon kerbals.

You always dont feel well.

I want the superpower of knowing everything.

Side effect: You are physically incapable of passing on your knowledge or making any good use out of it.

Super power: I can completely answer and understand the answer to any question I am asked.

Side effect: When your trying to keep secures you always respond to who ask.

Superpower: I can summon cheese.

SE: You have been attracted to the Moon.

3 hours ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

I want the superpower of knowing everything. 

SE: You know everything, and also why you should never try anything of what you know.

***

SP: Summon any SCP object.

Side effect: They all attack you 

Super power: Build good rockets in KSP

Side effect: your computer is slow so ksp is really leggy. Your good rockets won't be of much use here 

Superpower: infinite money

SE: surprises are ruined.

SP: I can summon every type of food.

Edited August 31, 2021 by Stormpilot

SE: All of it is poisoned.

SP: Stop and unstop time at will. You can move around during the freeze freely.

SE: Your enemies can too.

SP: Anything I draw can become real if I give it power.

SE: A lot of half-cut humans from portraits.

SP: The Superpower which I just have successfully applied, to intercept mosquitoes in one  jump clap.

***
Upd. Also, that's how the famous "one-hand clap" looks like. 

Spoiler

It's not about thinking out the thought out thoughts.

It's about naturally do natural things thoughtlessly, in one clap, before doubts and thoughts can disturb the calm lake of your mind.

To understand this completely, open the window of your mind, light the candle of patience, let mosquitoes get in, and start clap-meditating them out.

Edited August 31, 2021 by kerbiloid

SE: you clap your other arm too much and it falls off.

SP: I can eat anything and survive off of it.

SE: You are trapped on the old Kerbin that nobody likes to talk about because they covered it in toxic and radioactive waste.

SP: My reaction time is so fast that I dodge anything I choose to.

SE: your entire life is spent stuck existing in the perception of 1 singular plank unit of time.

SP: regenerative power (think either dead pool or wolverine)

 

232808312021

SE: You regenerate red blood cells so quickly that you need daily bloodletting appointments.

SP: I turn green when angry. No strength, I just change a sickly green color.

SE: People keep trying to trim you into the topiary shape they want.

SP: I can catch the roadrunner without falling off a cliff, having a boulder fall on me, getting run over, being blown up, running into a fake tunnel or anything else bad befalling me.

SE: You become ruler of the world and everyone gives you the responsibility of solving all the world's problems. But before you do something, you have to say "Ooga Boogaloos".

SP: Break the laws of Thermodynamics.

Spoiler
